metadata.title: CVE-2017-16667 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: backintime (aka Back in Time) before 1.1.24 did improper escaping/quoting of file paths used as arguments to the 'notify-send' command, leading to some parts of file paths being executed as shell commands within an os.system call in qt4/plugins/notifyplugin.py. This could allow an attacker to craft an unreadable file with a specific name to run arbitrary shell commands.

criterions.comment: backintime package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.24-0.1').
